googleapis/js-genai

TypeScript and JavaScript SDK for building with Gemini and Vertex AI

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Python library for Google’s Gemini AI models
  • build modular AI pipelines with async processing and Gemini API integration
  • Node.js framework for building Telegram bots with TypeScript support and easy API integration
  • JS-native infra-as-code library built for gen-AI
  • Vercel AI SDK provider for Google Gemini models via CLI
  • Integrates Gemini into Apple Shortcuts via Cloudflare Workers
  • Gemini CLI: command-line tool for running Gemini AI models and code tasks in your terminal
  • lets you automate browser tasks with Gemini or Vertex AI
  • TypeScript toolkit for building AI apps and agents
  • Fullstack app template combining React frontend and LangGraph backend with Gemini for web search and research automation
